body.p: With reference to your application and the subsequent interview you had with us, the Management is pleased to offer you an appointment as MANAGER at our Eenadu Corporate Office, Ramoji Film City on the following terms and conditions:

1.Your total remuneration as CTC shall beRs._____________________(Rupees only) per annum. All allowances/reimbursement as applicable will be subject to tax deduction at source. The Break-up particulars is enclosed herewith in Annexure |.
2.You are responsible for such duties and functions as detailed by the Management or by any other person nominated by the Management to allocate work to you from time to time.
3.Your designation may be changed as per the job entrusted and performed by you from time to time at the discretion of the management.

4.The terms set out in this letter are not comprehensive. In all matters related to service conditions, conduct and discipline your services will be governed by the Service Rules of the Company or any other rules framed by the Company from time to time.

5.You are liable to be transferred from one Branch/Office/ Section/Division/Job to another either in existence or which may come into existence anywhere in India. You shall also be liable to be deputed from one Unit to another Unit or to any of the group organizations, either temporarily or permanently. You will not be entitled to any additional remuneration on account of such transfer or deputation. However, your pay and allowances will be protected without any adverse effect.
6.You will be entitled to such Leave/Holidays with pay as may be prescribed by the rules and orders of the company for the time being in force.

7.You will retire on reaching the age of superannuation which shall be 58 years unless you are otherwise disqualified due to continued ill health, physical or mental disability and the like in which case you shall be relieved earlier compulsorily. The date of birth furnished in your SSC certificate and recorded in the service record shall be final and binding upon you for all purposed of service with the company.

9. During the period of employment with the Company or thereafter, you should not divulge to any other person, orally or in writing or in any manner whatsoever, directly or indirectly, any information, knowledge or skill, relating to the affairs of the Company, or its allied/associated/subsidiary Companies, which may come to your notice or knowledge by reason of your employment with the company.

10. It is understood and agreed that all trademarks/copyrights/ patents/intellectual property rights developed by you in either in full or part in the course of your employment in the company shall get automatically assigned to and shall remain the sole property of the company.

11. Upon termination or resignation from your employment with the company, you shall forthwith return to the company all the assets work in progress and property of the company, documents, files, soft copies, books, papers, memos or any other property of the company, in your possession or under your control. Your full and final settlement of account shall be done only on submission of no dues certificate, on your handing over of the companyâ€™s property.

12. While in employment of our company you shall not join in any political party or support the same either directly or indirectly and you shall not contest in any election to be held to the local bodies, assembly or parliament etc., or canvass in any such elections to any contesting candidates without the prior written permission of the management.Violation of this clause is a serious lapse on your part and your services are liable to be terminated without any notice.
13. You should adhere to the code of conduct/code of ethics as specified and notified by the management from time to time.

14. It shall be your duty to inform your employer immediately if you are affected with any. major health issues and you shall submit yourself to such medical examination as you may be required by the Management. Failure to submit to such medical examination renders you liable for termination of service immediately without any notice.
15. Your services are liable to be terminated by either side, on giving one month's notice or payment of one month's salary in lieu of notice period.
16. For breach of terms of employment on your part, the Company may terminate your employment with the Company without notice or assessing any reasons thereof.
17. You will be responsible for the safe-keeping and return in good condition and order of all the Company's property which may be in your use, custody and charge at the time of leaving the Company.

18. Any notice, order, communication or intimation sent to the postal addresses/ e-mail id furnished by you in your application/ service record shall be deemed to have been served on you and received for all purposes of service of such notice/ communication etc. If any change takes place in your addresses or e-mail id, it shall be intimated to the Office immediately.

If the above terms and conditions are acceptable to you, please report to The H R Department, Eenadu Corporate Office, Ramoji Film City, Anajpur (V), Abdullapurmet (M), R R Dist on 1% July, 2022 at 9.00 AM along with the signed duplicate copy of this letter of employment enclosed herewith in acceptance of the offer, failing which the offer of appointment will stand automatically cancelled on the expiry of the date mentioned above.
For USHODAYA ENTERPRICES PVT LTD
